Package group24.piazzapanic.game

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • group24.piazzapanic.game.Level
  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads level environment data from a file and stores it in a 2D array of stations. It stores a grid, integer positions refer to the top left corner of a station/tile as shown on screen to the player.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      Station[][] grid
      The grid of stations
      int startX
      The X starting position of the player
      int startY
      The Y starting position of the player
